channel.title: What Happened to the Dots?
channel.description:
I just realized, what happened to the dots or "circles" that used to be posted by mods? What I mean is when someone was muted, a mod would post a yellow dot in the post that lead to the mute.
Was this changed so that it was more of a "private" manner?

item.title: What Happened to the Dots?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:1, topic:394925”]I just realized, what happened to the dots or “circles” that used to be posted by mods? What I mean is when someone was muted, a mod would post a yellow dot in the post that lead to the mute.

Was this changed so that it was more of a “private” manner?[/quote]
That was part of an old (and shitty) mod that ran on SMF 1. SMF 2 comes with a built in moderation system that doesnt include the dots, and thats the one that is used here. So we lost the dots when we upgraded from 1 to 2.

item.title: What Happened to the Dots?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

It was decided not to make punishments public anymore, probably so nobody would get ‘ragged’ on about being muted or something, as well as narrowing down the work for giving a reason in the posts.
